MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY13 postcode area of Whitchurch, affecting properties in Prees and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of network investigations required. Our team are now looking to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:02PM on 1st November 2020.
